switch_profile_confirmation: Are you sure you want to switch to this profile?
checklist_intro: We make it easy to plan successful events. Here's how to start!
publish_event: Publish an event to reach millions of people in Tixery
highlight_brand: Highlight your brand by adding your organizer a name, logo and bio
get_paid: Get paid for future ticket sales by adding your bank details
complete_profile: A complete profile can increase discoverability, highlight your brand and trust among attendees
create_event_scratch_description: Add all your event details, create new tickets, and set up recurring events
create_with_ai_description: Answer a few quick questions to generate an event that's ready to publish almost instantly

modal.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this event? This action cannot be undone.

organizer profile?

mediaUploader.imageDescription: Drag and drop your images here, or click to browse. Recommended: JPG, PNG (max 5MB each).
mediaUploader.dragDropImages: Drag and drop images here, or click to upload
mediaUploader.videoDescription: Upload your event videos here. Recommended formats: MP4, MOV (max 10MB each).

eventTitle.eventSummary: A short and sweet sentence about your event
eventTitle.eventTitleDescription: Be clear and descriptive with a title that tells people what your event is about.
eventTitle.summaryDescription: Grab people's attention with a short description about your event. Attendees will see this at the top of your event page. (500 characters max)

dateAndTime.reserveSeatingAlert: Reserve seating is not available for recurring events.
dateAndTime.title: Date and Location
dateAndTime.recurringEventDescription: For timed entry and multiple days
dateAndTime.recurringEventInfo: You’ll be able to add dates and times in the next step.
dateAndTime.reservedSeatingDescription: Use your venue map to set price tiers for each section and choose whether attendees can pick their seat.
dateAndTime.verifyPhoneDescription: We'll send the phone number you enter a one-time verification code. This keeps Tixery a place to host real events.
dateAndTime.onlineEventInfo: Online events have unique event pages where you can add links to livestreams and more.
dateAndTime.displayEndTimeDescription: The time your event ends will appear on your event page

faqSection.title: Good to know
faqSection.description: Use this section to feature specific information about your event. Add highlights and frequently asked questions for attendees.
faqSection.subtitle: Frequently asked questions
faqSection.instructions: Answer questions your attendees may have about the event, like accessibility and amenities.

onlineEvent.title: Title
onlineEvent.attendeeEventPageDescription: Attendees will join your online event through your virtual venue. Use this space to add a live video or audio stream, share additional content, and customize the look of your event page.
onlineEvent.addLiveVideoAudioDescription: Add a live video or audio stream to your event. You can use any streaming service that provides a link to your stream.
onlineEvent.shareAdditionalContentDescription: Add additional content to your event. You can add files, links, and more.
onlineEvent.youtubeOnly: We currently support Youtube videos only
onlineEvent.notifyAttendees: Notify attendees when this is shown
onlineEvent.usingAttendeeEventPageDescription: We'll redirect your attendees to this page with automatic reminder emails and access instructions.

eventPublish.daysBeforeEventHelperText: Please enter a number between 1 and 30
eventPublish.daysBeforeEventDescription: Set how many days (1 to 30) before the event that attendees can request refunds.
eventPublish.automateRefundsDescription: Automatically approve refund requests for orders of one ticket if the event balance can cover the request. If turned off, you must respond to all refund requests within five days.
eventPublish.noRespondToRequests: No, I'll respond to each request

organizerProfileForm.orgURLDescription: Customizing your URL can help attendees find you when searching for your events. The URL can only contain letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.

community_guidelines_description: Our Community Guidelines describe the sort of content we prohibit. If you suspect an event may be in violation, you can report it to us so we can investigate.
contact_organizer_first: If you have a question about an event, need to resolve a dispute, or would like to request a refund, we encourage you to first contact the organizer directly.
imminent_danger_contact_law_enforcement: If you or someone else is in imminent danger as a result of an event listing, please contact your local law enforcement agency for assistance.
description_placeholder: Why do you believe this event listing is fraudulent or unauthorized? Please describe your relationship to the event...
report_submitted: Thank you for your report. We will investigate this event.

createEventWithAI.aiDescription: Answer a few questions about your event and our AI creation tool will use internal data to build an event page. You can still create an event without AI.
createEventWithAI.eventName: What’s the name of your event?
createEventWithAI.eventNameDescription: This will be your event’s title. Your title will be used to help create your event’s summary, description, category, and tags – so be specific!
createEventWithAI.eventStartEnd: When does your event start and end?
createEventWithAI.ticketPriceQuestion: How much do you want to charge for tickets?
createEventWithAI.ticketPriceDescription: Our tool can only generate one General Admission ticket for now. You can edit and add more ticket types later.
createEventWithAI.capacityQuestion: What's the capacity for your event?
createEventWithAI.capacityDescription: Event capacity is the total number of tickets you're willing to sell.
createEventWithAI.creationError: An error occurred while creating! Please try again.
createEventWithAI.title: Image Generation Failed
createEventWithAI.message: Image generation failed. Do you want to continue without the image?

organizerCreateTicket.endDateValid: End date must be a valid date
organizerCreateTicket.endDateAfterStartDate: End date must be after the start date
organizerCreateTicket.endTimeNotBeforeStartTime: End time cannot be earlier than start time.
organizerCreateTicket.visibleStartDateBeforeEndDate: Visible start date must be earlier than the end date
organizerCreateTicket.visibleEndDateAfterStartDate: Visible end date must be later than the start date

perkDescriptions.complimentaryFood: Enjoy complimentary food during the event
perkDescriptions.priorityEntry: Be among the first to enter the venue
perkDescriptions.freeDrinks: Includes complimentary drinks throughout the event
perkDescriptions.commemorativeTShirt: Receive a limited edition event T-shirt
perkDescriptions.extraLegroom: More comfortable seating with additional legroom
perkDescriptions.reservedSeating: Your seat is guaranteed and reserved

perkDescriptions.premiumView: Optimal viewing location within the venue.
perkDescriptions.dedicatedBarAccess: Exclusive access to a dedicated bar.
perkDescriptions.artistSignedItem: Receive an item signed by the artist(s).
perkDescriptions.soundCheckAccess: Access to the sound check before the event.
perkDescriptions.exclusiveContent: Access to content not available to the general public.

seatMapView.tableNotAvailable: This table is not available for selection

attendee404.subtitle: Oops! We can't find that page.
attendee404.message: It looks like you got lost in the event schedule. Don't worry – even the most enthusiastic attendees sometimes take a wrong turn.

organizer404.subtitle: Page Not Found
organizer404.message: It looks like the page you're looking for doesn't exist. As an organizer, we know time is valuable—let's get you back to managing your event.

somethingwentwrong.title: Something Went Wrong
somethingwentwrong.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try refreshing the page or return to a safe spot in our platform.

error.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong! Please try again later.

analytics.description: Overview of your event attendee statistics.
